eka dengu rogiyaku ho athi nowima sandaha dengu uwadura sampurnayen mandalimata saha honda saukhya parisarayak athikirimata rajya niladharin saha swechcha sanwidhana kriyakarin ekwa sarthaka wadasatahan 490k athurugiriya saha athurugiriya dakunu grama niladhari wasam dekehi pasugiyada sidukalaha.mahajana saukhya parikshaka wanniaarachchi samarawikrama, grama niladhari nimal pathmasiri saha piyarathna mallikaaarachchi yana ayage mulikathwayen pradeshaye sanwardhana niladharin, siwil aarakshaka kamitu kriyakarin, kaduwela maha nagara sabhawe dengu mardana wihidum balakaye kriyakarihu saha siwil sanwidhana samajikayo meyata ekwuha.ehidi mahajana saukhya parikshaka wanniaarachchi mahatha upades demin wimasa sitiye dengu maduruwan bowime waradata janathawata wiruddhawa nadu da dada mudal aya kara ganima ayogya heyin in walaki rajya sewakayan ha pradeshaye janathawa ekwa wiwidha krama kriyathmaka kara dengu mardanaya kirimath yahapath saukhya parisarayak athi kirimath kala yuthu bawa ya.mema wadasatahane di pradeshaye janathawa danuwath kirima, owunge saukhya gatalu wimasa piliyam yedima, geyin geta gos niwasa parisaraya saha gewathu pariksha kara balima, dengu kitayan winasha kirima, dengu bowana sthana soya bala piliyam yedima, hithakara saukhya parisarayak athi kirimata katayuthu yedima wani piyawara rasak kriyathmaka kalaha.
